prompts: A peaceful forest scene with tall trees
The same forest but now with falling autumn leaves
A gentle stream flowing through the forest
Wildlife animals appearing near the stream
A beautiful sunset filtering through the trees
The forest at night with moonlight shining through
A bustling city street during daytime
The same street as evening approaches
Street lights turning on as it gets darker
Night scene with neon signs glowing
Early morning sunrise over the city
A serene beach with calm waves
A sailboat appearing on the horizon
The boat coming closer to shore
Sunset colors reflecting on the water
Stars appearing in the twilight sky
